rules.natural: Whenever the panda is an endangered species, conservation funding for it is secured.
Under the condition that the panda is an endangered species, it is not the case that it has protected status.
Either the panda is an endangered species, or climate change is mitigated globally.

If the scientific evidence for the panda is strong, then provided that it is not the case that there is government support for conservation or that if the regional climate is not stable or climate mitigation is not active the regional ecosystem collapses, public awareness for conservation is high.
If captive breeding for the panda is initiated, then its breeding program is successful.
Should the breeding program for the panda be successful, its population grows.
In the event that the panda population is growing, the species has recovered.
Provided that an international treaty for the panda is signed, global cooperation for it is active.
If logging in the reserve is banned, then deforestation is occurring there.
Should logging in the reserve be banned, patrols there are effective.
Either logging in the reserve is banned, or if global cooperation for the panda is active, then provided that climate change is not mitigated globally, emergency measures for the panda are activated.
Given that enforcement in the reserve is strict, if patrols are effective then deforestation is not occurring.
Either enforcement in the reserve is strict, or monitoring technology is deployed there.
If monitoring technology is deployed in the reserve, then whenever patrols are effective, deforestation is not occurring.
If rainfall in the region is adequate, then climate change is mitigated globally.
Rainfall in the region is adequate, or irrigation there is supplemental.
Should the bamboo forest habitat be viable, the panda has protected status.
If the watershed in the region is protected, then the aquifer is healthy.
If the river in the region is clean, then either water sources are preserved or if irrigation is supplemental climate change is mitigated.
If research on the panda is ongoing, then its bamboo forest habitat is viable.
In the event that adaptive management for the panda is implemented, new threats to it have been identified.
Should patrol routes in the reserve be optimized, then if anti-poaching units are active, hunting the panda is not illegal.
If ranger training for the reserve is complete, then patrol routes are optimized.
Either human settlement is encroaching on the reserve, or the panda is not an endangered species.
If a buffer zone for the reserve is established, then human settlement is not encroaching.
A buffer zone for the reserve is established, or community engagement is successful.
Given that economic alternatives are provided to the community, if community engagement is successful then human settlement is not encroaching.
Either economic alternatives are provided to the community, or education programs are implemented there.
If education programs are implemented in the community, then should community engagement be successful, human settlement is not encroaching.
Development in the reserve is approved, or hunting the panda is not illegal.
If the environmental impact of the project is assessed, then development in the reserve is not approved.
The environmental impact of the project is assessed, or conservation is prioritized in planning.
If hunting the panda is illegal, then poaching of it is occurring.
Provided that hunting the panda is illegal, poaching of it is not occurring.
Should the legal framework for conservation be strong, then if conservation is prioritized in planning, development in the reserve is not approved.
If a legislative review is scheduled in parliament, then provided that the legal framework for conservation is not strong, policy gaps for conservation exist.
If the climate in the region is stable, then climate change is mitigated globally.
Whenever climate mitigation is active in the region, climate change is mitigated globally.

Provided that it is not the case that there is government support for conservation or that if the regional climate is not stable or climate mitigation is not active the regional ecosystem collapses, public awareness for conservation is not high.
If it is not the case that forest cover is stable or the watershed is protected or the river is clean, then soil erosion in the region is high.
If it is not the case that if conservation funding for the panda is secured then its habitat is viable, then hunting the panda is illegal.
If it is not the case that if forest cover is not stable or the watershed is not protected or the river is not clean then soil erosion is not high, then land management in the region is improved.

Under the condition that it is not the case that if forest cover is not stable or the watershed is not protected or the river is not clean then soil erosion is not high, land management in the region is not improved.

If it is not the case that if conservation funding for the panda is not secured or research is not ongoing then adaptive management is not implemented, then the conservation plan for the panda is updated.
Should it not be true that if climate change is not mitigated globally and an alternative habitat is not available then relocation is not planned, then captive breeding for the panda is initiated.
If climate change is not mitigated globally, then it is not the case that an alternative habitat for the panda is available.
Should climate change not be mitigated globally, emergency measures for the panda are not activated.

(¬G → A19).natural: Under the condition that climate change is not mitigated globally, emergency measures for the panda are activated.

(¬G → ¬A13).natural: If climate change is not mitigated globally, then it is not the case that an alternative habitat for the panda is available.

(¬G → ¬A19).natural: Should climate change not be mitigated globally, emergency measures for the panda are not activated.
